text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL703GS Scar 17.3” FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1070, 16GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Call of Duty: Warzone, and the performance throttles significantly. The trackpad has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL703GS Scar 17.3” FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1070, 16GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty since day one. performance throttles under load and the port selection feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL703GS Scar 17.3” FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1070, 16GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty since day one. blue screens occasionally and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL703GS Scar 17.3” FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1070, 16GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL703GS Scar 17.3” FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1070, 16GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.
